description: AI-powered MCP server for Apache Druid cluster management and analytic

environmentVariables.name: DRUID_ROUTER_URL
environmentVariables.description: Druid router URL for connecting to the Druid cluster

environmentVariables.name: DRUID_COORDINATOR_URL
environmentVariables.description: Druid coordinator URL for querying metadata endpoints (optional)

environmentVariables.name: DRUID_SSL_ENABLED
environmentVariables.description: Enable SSL/TLS support for Druid connections

environmentVariables.name: DRUID_SSL_SKIP_VERIFICATION
environmentVariables.description: Skip SSL certificate verification (for development/testing only)

environmentVariables.name: DRUID_MCP_READONLY_ENABLED
environmentVariables.description: Enable read-only mode (only GET requests and SQL queries allowed)
